name: purple-sloth-17
author: elijahgummer
description: purple-sloth-17 组件 (yellow, gradient, button, glow, modern, upload, hover effect, upload button, interactive)

original.html:
<button class="button">
  <svg id="UploadToCloud" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="16px" width="16px" class="icon">
    <path d="M0 0h24v24H0V0z" fill="none"></path>
    <path class="color000000 svgShape" fill="#000000" d="M19.35 10.04C18.67 6.59 15.64 4 12 4 9.11 4 6.6 5.64 5.35 8.04 2.34 8.36 0 10.91 0 14c0 3.31 2.69 6 6 6h13c2.76 0 5-2.24 5-5 0-2.64-2.05-4.78-4.65-4.96zM14 13v4h-4v-4H7l4.65-4.65c.2-.2.51-.2.71 0L17 13h-3z"></path>
  </svg>
  Upload CV
</button>
